item.title: Cristin Milioti Calls ‘The Penguin’ Role a “Bright Spot” Despite Being “Grisly” While Accepting First Emmy
item.description: She beat out Cate Blanchett, Meghann Fahy, Rashida Jones and Michelle Williams for lead actress in a limited series at the 2025 Emmys.

item.title: Cristin Milioti Starring in Unique Horror Movie ‘Buddy’ (Exclusive)
item.description: Production on the feature began week, with ‘Weapons’ banner BoulderLight among the producers.
